website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas Speed Turf baseball cleat brings an array of advantages when you decide to buy them. This casual-looking but stylish pair bring a comfortable and lightweight experience in the turf. The price hits the right spot for customers as it belongs to a budget-friendly price range.
pros: Most users of the Adidas Speed Turf love the stylish look of the pair
Several other reviewers state that the shoe has excellent quality
A significant number of commenters share that the shoe has a great fit
This Adidas turf baseball cleat is lightweight according to some wearers
This Adidas baseball shoe brings good support, indicate several players
A pair of shoppers say that this turf baseball cleat is comfortable to wear
This Speed Turf shoe is durable, a couple of commenters say
The pair’s price belongs to a budget-friendly range
cons: A customer says that his feet felt sore after wearing this baseball shoe for a while

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Looking
customer_reviews.text: I have this sneaker in 3 colors. They look great with matching Adidas track suits. Not really great arch support but the shoe is very lightweight and comfortable. Warning : The shoes ties in an odd way. Tough to explain but just be aware in case you getting caught off guard right out of the box. Very Happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: HCR

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These turf shoes felt very comfortable and have a nice look. I tried full size higher than my normal dress shoe. I felt the tread seamed shallow and would wear out to easily for playing softball. Returned for a different pair brand
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Adidas is now my preferred shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I ditched Nike aw years ago and now I only eat Adidas. These shoes fit true to size and are comfortable and look nice. Not sure I like the nubbies on the bottom after having the trainer shoes from last year that have a flat soul. Might just take some time to get used to. The bottoms are slick at first but after wearing them around they are starting to get a grip. I got my son a pair also and he likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Jay C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe
customer_reviews.text: O picked these up on sale. I own various pairs of Adidas. Comfort is not a question. They are very comfortable. Issue is they removed the heel strap to assist putting on. That is why only decent rating and 4 stars. Please put the handle back on
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little big.
customer_reviews.text: They run a little big. I wear a 9 in nike and under armour. I should have ordered an 8 or 81/2 in these. Clean as hell though and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I helped to coach baseball this summer, and wanted something to save my daily wear tennis shoes from getting ruined. This fit the bill perfectly, and withstood the wear and tear much better than other tennis shoes I tried. Very comfortable and adequate protection for the foot, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Patton

customer_reviews.title: Not men's sizes
customer_reviews.text: These are not men's sizing. If you are a woman order your regular size, men size up! We had to return them 3 times to get the right sizing. Otherwise they seem to be OK shoes. Thank goodness for free returns!
customer_reviews.author: Par4anne

customer_reviews.title: Adidas Men Turf!
customer_reviews.text: Great 👍🏽, but a little to tapered at toe could be more rounded but other than that very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was very comfortable. The only two "Negatives" is that there is no pull on loop at the back and the two small eyelets at the top / sides will eventually break if used. They seem "unneeded". Overall good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W. Ray

customer_reviews.title: !!!  CAUTION - - - NARROW !!!
customer_reviews.text: The length is true to size however, these shoes are very narrow across the toe box. I tried wearing them inside for a few hours to see if they would stretch a little but had to take them off because my feet were going numb.
customer_reviews.author: JasonR

customer_reviews.title: Great look. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are quality you expect for Adidas. Takes a little getting used to stripes on toe box. Overall great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: bj duckworth

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction guaranteed comfort..
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable sneakers,for walking ,jogging . Highly recommend these sneakers to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: kevin watson

customer_reviews.title: Not a Cross Trainer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes to work out in. They have no support and should not be advertised for training. Maybe running at best plus they have rubber cleats? One would think a baseball shoe would have some support much like a court or basketball shoe. Not these am sorry to say!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice stylish turf shoe. Comfortable when transitioning from your cleats!
customer_reviews.author: Austin. K

customer_reviews.title: My run a littler than normal size
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 15 but, in my experience, Adidas run smaller so I ordered a size up and they are really comfortable. I ordered them in burgundy and royal blue. Absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Deland B.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit even for big feet
customer_reviews.text: They fit great and are very lightweight. The only complaint that I have noticed, is that the upper edge is already frayed and has a hole in it after less than one month of owning them (around 25 games of softball on dirt and turf)
customer_reviews.author: James Conner

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: My son wears a size 12 this shoe fit perfect! They are comfortable and perfect for indoor baseball practice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit comfortable is important to me
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are awesome I love them baseball sneakers also love the color Maroon my color😍❤️
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Great traction and fit!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit. I have a narrow foot and it just fits in width so wider feet may have issues. I’m using it as a golf shoe and the traction is great.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Kerfin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, durable and comfy my boyfriend says. He's a size 10 so I got him a 10.5 and he said it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: They are light, have good padding and are extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: My sad like his shoes. He said, they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my upcoming season. Haven't worn them yet. They look great, are lightweight, and have the same turf pattern as other shoes that I've worn before. Those performed fantastic. So I suspect that these will as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Cuellar

customer_reviews.title: Get them
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised Gorgeous Sexy Great shoe Stylish My husband loves them True to size
customer_reviews.author: Krissi Starr

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow, awkward fitting shoe. I have other adidas shoes and 11.5 fit well. These are long and narrow.. I would not but these again.
customer_reviews.author: KW0822

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking shoes and I have 5 pair.  Great grip on the bottom.  Get your normal size.
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 pairs of these shoes. White, black, maroon, navy and royal and I love them. They have great grips on the bottom. These are not the tight “lock down” fit like the icon 5 turf trainers so I would not go a half side bigger. I wear a Icon 5 in a 9.5 but these I wear my normal size 9. These look really sharp. They don’t have much arch support but overall they’re comfortable and get the job done. They have held up great for a year.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie H

customer_reviews.title: Curious
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the shoe are they just being purchased for turf baseball?
customer_reviews.author: Al

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Speed Turf Shoes Baseball
product_meta.description: Designed for versatile wear in the clubhouse or on the field, these baseball shoes feature a widened lacing system for a comfortable fit. Abrasion protection on the mesh upper and toe cap provides durability while elevated internal support delivers a custom, locked-down fit. The rubber outsole adds soft grip on turf.
feature_bullets: Mesh upper with abrasion resistant TPU overlays, Mesh tongue with gore wings
Turf traction rubber outsole, Textile lining
